sentences.en: An honorary degree was conferred on him by the university.
sentences.cn: 这所大学授予他荣誉学位.

sentences.en: An honorary doctorate of law was conferred on him by Newcastle University in 1976.
sentences.cn: 1976年，纽卡斯尔大学授予他荣誉法学博士学位。

sentences.en: Arbitration Commission has one honorary Chairman and several advisers.
sentences.cn: 盅倜委员会设名誉主任一人顾问若干人.

sentences.en: Brown received an honorary doctorate from Seoul University.
sentences.cn: 布朗获得了首尔大学的荣誉博士学位。

sentences.en: But all my work was honorary. How should I earn my living?
sentences.cn: 但我所有的工作都是义务的. 我该怎样来挣钱糊口 呢 ?

sentences.en: Dragon Three Message Display is the honorary product of Meironsion.
sentences.cn: 龙牌三面翻是陌龙的荣誉产品.

sentences.en: Farewell Dinner cum Announcement of Our Lifetime Honorary Advisor Prof Zhaoyi.
sentences.cn: 饯行晚宴及委任,副教授赵毅为协会的永久名誉顾问.

sentences.en: He received an honorary degree and numerous tributes.
sentences.cn: 他接受了荣誉学位和无数称颂之词.

sentences.en: Oxford University awarded him an honorary Masters in 1755.
sentences.cn: 牛津大学在1755年授予他荣誉硕士学位.

sentences.en: Prussia made him an honorary citizen.
sentences.cn: 普鲁士市授予他“荣誉市民”的称号.

sentences.en: She becomes an honorary member of the baseball team.
sentences.cn: 她成为了棒球队的名誉成员.

sentences.en: The 12 - time Grammy winner received countless awards and honorary college degrees.
sentences.cn: 这位12项格莱美奖的得主获得过无数奖项和无数大学的荣誉学位.

sentences.en: The college gave the ambassador an honorary degree.
sentences.cn: 学院授予该大使名誉学位.

sentences.en: The university awarded him an honorary degree.
sentences.cn: 该大学授予他荣誉学位.

sentences.en: The university conferred on him the honorary degree of Doctor of Laws.
sentences.cn: 大学授予他法学博士荣誉学位.

sentences.en: This position in our village is mostly honorary.
sentences.cn: 这个职务在我们村里多半是荣誉性质的.

words.tran_cn: 荣誉的；值得尊敬的；表示尊敬的；正直的
尊敬；[金融] 承兑；承兑远期票据
荣誉的；名誉的；道义上的

trans.tran_cn: 荣誉的，光荣的，名誉的，名誉上的，道义上的，纪念性的
trans.tran_en: an honorary title, rank, or university degree is given to someone as an honour

trans.tran_cn: 名誉学位；获名誉学位者；名誉团体
